snippet: Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their Group One super 10 match of the World Twenty20 at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Beat South Africa by Five Runs in World T20
headline.main: Sri Lanka Beat South Africa by Five Runs in World T20

lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their Group One super 10 match of the World Twenty20 at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday.
